messages.subject: castles

messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>We've been having an "it works!" week around here it seems. My 3 1/2
yr old
son is currently building a huge castle with mega blocks in the living room.
In the last few weeks he's gotten some books from the library and off ebay
about castles and medieval times. Last weekend he even got grandma to sew
him an
awesome knight costume with his help of course!<<<<<<<


Usborne has a GREAT Castle book. Duncan got it last week, and *I* can't put
it down! <g>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
